sentence.Network_en: A new collector BK 307 for lepidolite flotation is investigated andcompared with mixed amine.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了浮选锂云母矿物的新捕收剂BK307,同时将BK307与混合胺浮选锂云母进行了比较.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 锂云母(Lepidolite) 又称鳞云母 K{Li2-xAl1+x〔Al2xSi4-2xO10〕(F,OH)2},其中x=0～0.5。 【化学组成】 置换K的有Na、Rb、Cs。置换Li和Al的有Fe2+.
lepidine 勒皮啶lepidolite 鳞云母lethal dose 致死量

list.abs: electron microprobe study of Cs minerals in the Yashan topaz lepidolite granite , Jiangxi Province江西雅山黄玉锂云母花岗岩中铯矿物的电子探针研究

methods for chemical analysis of spodumenite and lepidolite concentrates -- The ion selective electrode method for the determination of fluorine content in lepidolite concentratesGB/T3885.10-1983锂辉石、锂云母精矿化学分析方法离子选择电极法测定锂云母中氟量

methods for chemical analysis of spodumenite and lepidolite concentrates -- The chromazurol S and cetyltrimethyl ammonium bromide photometric method for the determination of beryllium oxide contentGB/T3885.8-1983锂辉石、锂云母精矿化学分析方法铬天青S-CTMAB光度法测定氧化铍量

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Greek lepis, lepid- 'scale' + -lite

means.word_mean: 1. a mineral of the mica group; an important source of lithium
